[-9]: Search your library for a card and exile it. You may cast it without paying its mana cost until the end of your next turn.

cards.card_name: Velencium City of Smog Draft Archetypes
cards.rules_text:
{W}{U} FLASH CONTROL [/b]Play at instant speed to disrupt your opponent.
{U}{B} MILL Use psychic Illithid Vampires to mill your opponents.
{B}{R} RECRUIT SOLDIERS Create Soldier tokens, then make them big.
{R}{G} STOMPY RAMP Classic ramp that gets big quickly.
{G}{W} RECRUIT CITIZENS Create all the citizens.
{W}{B} LIFE GAIN Use food tokens and Nobles to gain life.
{U}{R} ARTIFACTS Play a bunch of artifacts to get triggers.
{B}{G} DEATH Swing in fast and let your creatures die for advantage.
{R}{W} RECONFIGURE Play equipment that are also creatures to Voltron your way to victory.
{G}{U} TURNING FACE DOWN Turn your creatures face down to gain advantage.
{W}{C} ETB BLINKS Trigger ETBs with biblically accurate angels.
{U}{C} RECRUIT HOMUNCULI Create a Homunculus, then grow it to gargantuan proportions.
{B}{C} DISCARD Make your opponents discard their hand, then use your cards from the graveyard when they're heckbent.
{R}{C} AGGRO Classic Red Deck Wins, just a little weirder.
{G}{C} ACTIVATED ABILITIES Use your excess mana for incremental effects.
